name: Dining table with bench, 2 chairs, and side table
description:
- Solid wood dining table set
- Constructed from very thick solid wood (tabletops & legs are 2-4 inches thick)
- Includes a solid wood bench and two solid wood chairs
- Includes a solid wood round side table that can be placed next to your sofa
- Dining table dimensions: 140 x 80 x 76 cm (LxWxH)
- Side table dimensions: 60 x 55 cm (diam x H)
- Bench dimensions: 130 x 37 x 44 cm (LxWxH)
- Chair seat dimensions: 44 x 44 x 44 cm (LxWxH)
- Chair height: 91 cm
- Brand: Hipvan
- Purchased for > SGD 2000
- Features a natural wood finish
- Ideal for small apartments
- In perfect condition (no scratches or watermarks)

name: Sofa bed
description:
Ikea ASKENÄSET sofa bed. 

The middle of the sofa where it is folded/unfolded ha  sagged a bit due to wear and tear, but still functional. May not be suitable for elderly because (a) as a sofa, the seat may be too wide/deep, and (b) as a bed, it may be on the softer side. 

3 big cushions with synthetic inner filling. 2 smaller cushions with original down filling. 

Sofa and cushion covers can be removed and washed. 

Will cover transport.
